env GO111MODULE=on

[short] skip
[!cgolang] skip

# Regression test for golanglang.org/issue/29667:
# spurious 'failed to cache compiled Go files' errors.

env GOCACHE=$WORK/golangcache
mkdir $GOCACHE

golang list -json -compiled -test=false -export=false -deps=true -- . &
golang list -json -compiled -test=false -export=false -deps=true -- . &
wait

-- golang.mod --
module sandbox/bar
-- bar.golang --
package bar

import "C"
